channel.title: OutOfMemoryError
channel.description:
and server shuts down...
This happens when i have run the server for a long time, i know that it is not a problem of having enough ram when the server shuts down, because just before it stops im only using 50-60% of memory. If an autorestarter would work, tell me where to get one.
